articles.author: Helen Kelly
articles.title: ‘If Scotland was in Europe you wouldn’t have 2.8million vaccinated' Sturgeon shamed on GMB - Express
articles.description: NICOLA STURGEON was shamed by Sean Fletcher on Good Morning Britain as she outlined her hopes for independence and for Scotland to rejoin the European Union.

articles.author: Tamar Kahn
articles.title: Delay in J&J shots after mistakes by US firm could slow start of vaccine rollout - Business Day
articles.description: Aspen awaits nod from medicine regulators in the US and Europe to release doses
articles.content: The release of SAs first commercial shipment of Johnson & Johnsons (J&Js) Covid-19 vaccine from Aspen Pharmacares Gqeberha facility is being delayed as a precautionary safety measure after pr… [+350 chars]

articles.author: RAJES PAUL
articles.title: Badminton: Positive attitude - The Star Online
articles.description: PETALING JAYA: It was not an ending that Viktor Axelsen had wanted at the European Championships but the Dane is ready to move on after testing positive for Covid-19 in Ukraine.
articles.content:
PETALING JAYA: It was not an ending that Viktor Axelsen had wanted at the European Championships but the Dane is ready to move on after testing positive for Covid-19 in Ukraine.

articles.author: Sean Martin
articles.title: Asteroid simulation by NASA and ESA confirms Earth not prepared for major strike - Daily Express
articles.description: AN ASTEROID simulation event held by NASA and the European Space Agency has confirmed has one thing: eventually, a major asteroid is going to strike our planet and we need to prepare better for it.
